titles.title: O Let Us Rejoice In The Lord (easy nice tune)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then rejoice evermore Rejoice evermore It is better to sing than be sighing It is better to live than be dying So let us rejoice evermore{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O let us rejoice in the Lord evermore Tho all things around us be trying Tho floods of affliction like sea billows roar It's better to sing than be sighing{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O let us rejoice in the Lord evermore When the darts of the tempter are flying For Satan still dreads as he oft did of yore Our singing much more than our sighing{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O let us rejoice in the Lord evermore When sickness upon us is stealing No cordial like gladness our strength can restore For joy is the fountain of healing{/lang-eng}
